data.title: 26 Passions Trivia Quizzes (Questions and Answers)
data.meta_description: The best quizzes in this category as voted by visitors.
data.text:
1.

Name That 'Passions' Character

Multiple Choice

15 Qns

I give you a description of a 'Passions' character, and all you have to do is name that character! This shouldn't be too hard, if you have been watching 'Passions' for awhile. Good luck!

Very Easy, 15 Qns, butterbean05, Feb 10 09

Very Easy

butterbean05

2715 plays

4.

'Passions' Family Tree

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

If you have ever been confused about who is related to who on 'Passions', this is the quiz for you! After taking this quiz, you should know how everyone relates in Harmony. Have fun!

Easier, 10 Qns, VRSetter08, Feb 10 09
